Projects

Something that I've built

1

MONEYFOLIO

Moneyfolio is a responsive web app for tracking expenses. It allows tracking last month and overall spending by searching specific period, category and search term. A chart is also projected in the app based on the transactions associated with each category.

React/Redux/Chart JS/Firesbase/Sass
React.js
2

coin tracker

bitcoin

Coin Tracker is simple web app to quickly find crypto currency. Coin Tracker is fetching data from API, and show list of crypto currency with pagination and auto complete seaerch. Coin Tracker uses routing pure css3 for pagination, auto complete.

React.js / CSS3/ Third party API
HTML5/CSS3/JS/jquery
3

UrbanMeal

A fully responsive showcase of what an e-commerce meal delivery service could look like.

4

YOUTUNOTE

This web application allows you to take notes while watching videos on the same screen. Both notes and videos can be freely moved and resized, and both can be saved.

JS/ node js/Express/Bootstrap4/HTML5/CSS3
React
5

RandomDecisionMaker

This generator makes a quick decision for you by picking a choice from a selection list of items you provide.

Sass/CSS3/HTML5/JS
6

Portfolio website

Built responsive web portfolio with based css-desgined.
